meanings.sent1: The drippy faucet kept me awake all night with its constant dripping.
meanings.sent2: The popsicle was drippy, causing sticky fingers and a mess.
meanings.sent3: The drippy paint made the wall look like a colorful waterfall.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were drippy with tears as she watched the sad movie.
meanings.sent5: The drippy candle wax created a beautiful pattern as it dripped down the side of the candle.

meanings.sent1: She wrote a drippy love letter filled with hearts and poetry.
meanings.sent2: The movie was so drippy that it made everyone in the theater cry.
meanings.sent3: His drippy speech at the wedding made everyone reach for tissues.
meanings.sent4: The drippy music reminded her of all the happy memories from her childhood.
meanings.sent5: The drippy card made her smile with its heartfelt message and cute drawings.

meanings.sent1: The drippy sponge left streaks on the counter instead of cleaning it.
meanings.sent2: His shoes were drippy after walking in the rain for hours.
meanings.sent3: The drippy sandwich was a result of forgetting to pack it properly.
meanings.sent4: The drippy towel hung limply on the rack, forgotten after the shower.
meanings.sent5: The drippy umbrella was more of a hassle than a help in the storm.
